** VIM SUROUND **
ys{motion}[surround-type] For example ysiw" puts quotes around the word the cursors on.

cs{motion}[surround-type] For example csiw" changes the surroundings to quotes on the word the
cursors on.

ds[surround-type] Removes the surroundings from the cursors position.

If you use _(_ the result will be *(Whatever)*, if you use _)_ the result will be *( Whatever )* with
spaces around.
